about_the_game:
Habitually late streamer Jerma985 is, you guessed it, late for another stream. With a whole laundry list of chores to complete and time running out, will he be able to stream at all? It's up to you to get him ready!

ADVENTURE AWAITS

Explore the Jerma manor, from the darkest depths of the basement to the casino in his living room. Every inch has been faithfully recreated in stunning 3D, then pre-rendered to a 640x480 texture and compressed to hell. Enjoy!

A COLORFUL CAST OF CHARACTERS

Folks, we've got em all. Mr. Green, Wall Dad, Jex, the uh... clowns? From the dollhouse stream? Those guys are there too.

REFERENCES

Hey remember that one bit from that Jerma stream from like three years ago? No?

MINIATURE GAMES

We've got a blackjack minigame, we've got the wire puzzle from the famous social deduction game with the little colorful beans. We might even have a quick time event thrown in there, but don't tell anyone. That'll be our secret.



DISCLAIMER: This is a fan game completely unaffiliated with Jerma985 and the JERMA family of products. It was not commissioned by Jerma985 and in no way represents him. It's also totally free, no money required!

highlighted.name: S E C R E T B U P

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Jerma & Otto: The Curse of the Late Streamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Jerma985 is late for his stream, again, and it's up to you to help him get ready!
